I think a nicer order (that would also let you avoid a copy of captured_inputs) would be this:

auto next_frame = environment_stack->next;
for (const auto& x : curr_frame.captured_inputs) {
  n->addInput(next_frame->getVar(x, stmt));
  next->setVar(x, n->addOutput());
}
environment_stack = next_frame;
